snippet: President Bashar al-Assad and rebels seeking to oust him have accused each other of deploying chemical weapons.
abstract: United Nations team arrives in Damascus to begin long-awaited investigation into alleged use of chemical weapons in Syria's civil war; President Bashar al-Assad and rebels seeking to oust him have accused each other of deploying the weapons.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and HWAIDA SAAD

lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad and rebels seeking to oust him have accused each other of deploying chemical weapons.

headline.main: U.N. Team Arrives in Syria to Assess Possible Chemical Arms Use
headline.print_headline: U.N. Team Arrives in Syria to Assess Possible Chemical Arms Use

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
